metadata.title: CVE-2019-20797 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in e6y prboom-plus 2.5.1.5. There is a buffer overflow in client and server code responsible for handling received UDP packets, as demonstrated by I_SendPacket or I_SendPacketTo in i_network.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-20797` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

prboom-plus - 2:2.5.1.7um+git82-1
prboom-plus-game-server - 2:2.5.1.7um+git82-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: prboom-plus package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:2.5.1.7um+git82-1').
